sections.title: Privacy Policy
paragraphs: “Deals” respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal data.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
bullets: Account Information: Name, email, and phone number (if you register).
Usage Data: App interaction, preferences, and clicks.
Device Data: IP address, device model, OS version, language, and location.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
bullets: To provide and personalize the app experience.
To analyze usage and improve the app.
To communicate promo updates, if you opt-in.

sections.title: 3. Sharing Your Data
paragraphs: We may share your data with:
bullets: Third-party services like analytics (e.g., Google Firebase).
Affiliate partners for tracking redeemed promo codes.

sections.title: 4. Data Retention
paragraphs: We keep your data only as long as necessary for the purposes listed above.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
bullets: Request access to or deletion of your data.

sections.title: 6. Data Security
paragraphs: We implement secure methods to protect your data from unauthorized access.

sections.title: 7. International Data Transfers
paragraphs: Data may be processed in or transferred to countries outside the UAE, including the US and EU, in compliance with applicable laws.

sections.title: 8. Children’s Privacy
paragraphs: Our app is not intended for users under the age of 13.

sections.title: 9. Contact Us
paragraphs: If you have any concerns, email us at: privacy@appname.com.
